item.filter: SQL Instance MSSQLSERVER Server: Service State
SQL Instance MSSQLSERVER: Total Latch Wait Time (ms)

panels.description:
0 = Online
1 = Restoring
2 = Recovering: SQL Server 2008 through SQL Server 2017
3 = Recovery pending : SQL Server 2008 through SQL Server 2017
4 = Suspect 
5 = Emergency: SQL Server 2008 through SQL Server 2017
6 = Offline: SQL Server 2008 through SQL Server 2017
7 = Copying : Azure SQL Database Active Geo-Replication 
10 = Offline Secondary : Azure SQL Database Active Geo-Replication
21 = Mirrored, Secondary Synchronized
23 = Mirrored, Principal, Synchronized
25 = Mirrored, Secondary, Not Synchronized
26 = Mirrored, Principal, Not Synchronized
31 = Always On, Synchronized
35 = Always On, Not Synchronized
40 = Log Shipping, Standby / Read-Only
41 = Log Shipping, Restoring
42 = Log Shipping, Recovering

256.text: UNABLE TO GET CURRENT SERVICE STATE
